title: How do i join Clash?? there is no "competition" tab
body: i wanted to make a clash team, but there does not apper to be a "competition" button in the tap.... help?

replies.body:
There is no clash going on right now.

Considering it keeps breaking, i have a feeling riot is taking it apart and whacking it with a wrench (spanner?) until it is less of a mess.

>
> There is no clash going on right now.
> 
> Considering it keeps breaking, i have a feeling riot is taking it apart and whacking it with a wrench (spanner?) until it is less of a mess.

hmm i dont know about wacking a computer program with a wrench/spanner is ideal i mean i use them to wack on cars for work and they do ok most of the time but not great for software or electrical issues on cars , i might be doing it wrong though
i believe clash got terminated due to bugs a while ago
